short_desc: FRMDATEB6L must not be from date before form was released
full_desc: Q0a. FRMDATEB6L (B6L form date) must not be from date before form was released (2017)

test_name: LBSPBRTH aligns with LBCAAPN on Form D1L and APNEA on Form A5D2
short_desc: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPBRTH = 1 then LBCAAPN and APNEA should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q6. LBSPBRTH (Have you ever been told that you stop breathing in your sleep?) = 1 (Yes), then Form D1L Q4b. LBCAAPN (Obstructive sleep apnea) and  Form A5D2 Q5I. APNEA (Sleep apnea) should not equal 0 (Absent)
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPBRTH = 1 and (LBCAAPN = 0 or APNEA = 0)

test_name: LBSPTRT aligns with CPAP on Form A5D2
short_desc: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPTRT = 1 then CPAP should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q6a. LBSPTRT (currently being treated for this (e.g. CPAP) = 1 (Yes), then Form A5D2 Q 5I1. CPAP (Typical use of breathing machine (e.g., CPAP) at night over the past 12 months) should not equal 0 (None)
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPTRT = 1 and CPAP = 0

test_name: LBSPLEGS aligns with LBCALGSL on Form D1L
short_desc: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPLEGS = 1 then LBCALGSL should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q2. LBSPLEGS (Have you been told that your legs repeatedly jerk or twitch during sleep) = 1 (Yes), then Form D1L Q4c. LBCALGSL (Periodic leg movements of sleep) should not equal 0 (Absent)
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPLEGS = 1 and LBCALGSL = 0

test_name: LBSPDRM aligns with LBCAREM on Form D1L, RBD on Form A5D2, and BEREM on Form B9
short_desc: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPDRM = 1 then LBCAREM, RBD, and BEREM should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q1. LBSPDRM (Have you ever been told that you seem to "act out your dreams" while sleeping) = 1 (Yes), then Form D1L Q4b. LBCAREM (REM sleep behavior disorder), Form A5D2 Q5j. RBD (REM sleep behavior disorder) and Form B9 Q12t. BEREM (Participant currently manifests meaningful change in behavior - REM sleep behavior disorder) should not equal 0 (Absent)
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPDRM = 1 and (LBCAREM = 0 or RBD = 0 or BEREM = 0)

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=1, then CDRGLOB must be >0
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM (Is participant too cognitively impaired to complete form?) = 1 (Yes), then UDS B4 CDRGLOB (global CDR score) must be >0

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPDRM[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSPDRM should equal 1
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q1. LBSPDRM (Have you ever been told that you seem to "act out your dreams" while sleeping) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSPDRM should equal 1 at the current visit.
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPDRM[prev_vis] = 1 and LBSPDRM = 0

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPYRS in (0-99) and LBSPYRS[prev_vis] in (0-99), then LBSPYRS should be > LBSPYRS[prev_vis]
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q1a1. LBSPYRS (How many years has this been going on?), then LBSPYRS should increase from the last visit
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPYRS[prev_vis] and LBSPYRS in (0-99) and LBSPYRS[prev_vis] > LBSPYRS

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPINJS[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSPINJS should equal 1
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q1b. LBSPINJS (Have you ever been injured from these behaviors) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSPINJS should equal 1 at the current visit.
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPINJS[prev_vis] = 1 and LBSPINJS = 0

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPINJP[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSPINJP should equal 1
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q1c. LBSPINJP (Has a bedpartner ever been injured from these behaviors) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSPINJP should equal 1 at the current visit.
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPINJP[prev_vis] = 1 and LBSPINJP = 0

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPWALK[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSPDRM should equal 1
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q4. LBSPWALK (Have you ever walked around the bedroom or house in your sleep) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSPWALK should equal 1 at the current visit.
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPWALK[prev_vis] = 1 and LBSPWALK = 0

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPAWAK[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSPAWAK should equal 1
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q5. LBSPAWAK (Have you ever snorted or choked yourself awake) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSPAWAK should equal 1 at the current visit.
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPAWAK[prev_vis] = 1 and LBSPAWAK = 0

short_desc: If LBSPCGIM=0 and LBSPBRTH[prev_vis] = 1, then LBSPBRTH should equal 1
full_desc: If Q0. LBSPCGIM = 0 and Q6. LBSPBRTH (Have you ever been told that you stop breathing in your sleep) = 1 (Yes) at the last visit, then LBSPBRTH should equal 1 at the current visit.
test_logic: If LBSPCGIM = 0 and LBSPBRTH[prev_vis] = 1 and LBSPBRTH = 0
